languages.description: Building application skeleton with various tools depending on the project environment, going from custom HTML5, template engine such as Handlebars or using standard libraries like Bootstrap.
I design websites using latest CSS trends but compliant with multiple browsers, all compiled using the standard CSS extension language such as SCSS or LESS.
Building interactivity using Vanilla Javascript or jQuery, as well as application with Javascript frameworks such as React or Vue.
As a video game enthusiast, I enjoy using Unity engine which gave me some experience with the C# language.
